==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|lit=to increase fuel}}
{{was fwotd|2014|November|15|lang=zh}}

===Etymology===
It started to be used as an interjection in the '60s and '70s during the Macau Grand Prix when people start chanting "{{lang|zh|加油}}", urging the drivers to step on the gas pedal to increase speed.

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[refuel]]
# to [[oil]]; to [[lubricate]]
# to [[accelerate]]; to [[hit the gas]]
# to make extra [[effort]]
# to [[cheer on|cheer]] someone on

====Derived terms====
{{zh-der|加油站|加油加醋|加油機|加油添醋|加油添醬|火上加油|空中加油|空中加油飛機}}

===Interjection===
{{zh-interj}}

# [[come on]]!, [[go]]!
#: {{zh-x|加油，你 能 行 的！|'''Come on''', you can do it!}}
#: {{zh-x|中國，加油！|'''Go''', China!}}

====Usage notes====
* This interjection is [[idiomatic]]. It is mainly used during sporting events, games or competitions, or just to encourage someone.
